🌟 Know Your Referrals – Empower Creators Transparently 🌟

🚀 Very Early Stages – Your Feedback Matters! 💡
Welcome to the proof-of-concept phase of our journey! 🌱 This extension is just getting started, and we need your insights to make it amazing. By sharing your thoughts, you’ll help shape the future of this tool. 🛠️ Reach out on Patreon or BuyMeACoffee (both 100% free!), and let’s create something awesome together! 💬✨

🔎 Browse Confidently, Support Creators Authentically
With this extension, you can explore the web with peace of mind. 🌐 No sneaky extensions opening referral links behind your back—everything is crystal-clear and in your control. 💻✨

Here’s how it helps:
🛍️ Transparency: You’ll see every referral link opened and know exactly why it’s happening.
🏆 Fair Play: When checking out, you can choose to support the creator who truly recommended the product—not some hidden middleman hijacking your clicks.

💡 What This Extension Does:
✅ Tracks all links you open in your browser.
✅ Detects referral links and pops up with detailed info.
✅ Helps you support the creators who genuinely deserve it.

🛡️ Why Choose This Extension?
Malicious extensions can silently reroute your clicks through their own referrals, stealing credit from the creators you trust. 😡 With Know Your Referrals, you stay informed and make sure your appreciation reaches the right person. 🙌

❤️ Support the Mission!
This extension is completely free to use! 🎉 But if you love what we’re building, we’d be so grateful for your support. It means the world to us. 💕

✨ Together, let’s make the internet a fairer, more transparent space! ✨


🚨 Disclaimer – 100% Affiliate-Free Zone 🚨
🔒 No Hidden Partnerships, No Sneaky Switcheroos!
I want to be super transparent with you—this extension is built with your trust at its core. 💡 Here’s the deal:
🚫 No Affiliate Partnerships: I don’t partner with any affiliate programs, creators, or companies. This means I’m not secretly promoting or prioritizing anyone’s links over another.
🔄 No Link Replacements: The extension will never replace or reorder referral links to favor one creator over another. What you see is exactly what’s happening—no hidden agendas, ever!
This tool is all about giving you control, ensuring fairness, and empowering you to make informed choices. 🌟 Your trust means everything to me, and I promise to keep things transparent, honest, and completely unbiased. 🙌

✨ Happy browsing, and thank you for supporting creators the right way! ✨
